text: "Kiss Kiss Kiss"The single is officially stylized as KISS KISS KISS, in capitals. KISS KISS KISS ： 鈴木亜美 ： avex network is Japanese singer and actress Ami Suzuki's twenty-ninth single (sixteenth single in Avex) and it was released on October 28, 2009. At the time of the single release, Ami's official site, as well as other music sites鈴木亜美：KISS KISS KISS/aishiteru… ｜mu- moショップ considered this work to be a double A-side single along with "Aishiteru...", but the work itself, as well as Avex official site, mention only "Kiss Kiss Kiss" to be the A-side, and "Aishiteru..." to be the coupling track. ==Background== "Kiss Kiss Kiss" is originally a song performed by American group Ananda Project.鈴木亜美×FPM！ - HMV Online Ami first recorded the English version of the song, which was included in the compilation "Aquamarine" for Avex's dance music project House Nation. Later on she wrote herself the lyrics for a Japanese version for it, and it became her 16th Avex single.鈴木亜美がクラブ・シーンで既にハウスアンセムとなっているフロア大合唱のナンバー「KISS KISS KISS」... -MUSIC LOUNGE PICKUP- Initial information of this single said that it would be produced by House Nation collaborator Tomoyuki Nakata. At the end, this song, "Aishiteru...", became merely the coupling track of the single. ==Promotion== "Kiss Kiss Kiss" was used as the theme song for promotions of the Toyota X "202" model. In the music video of the song, Ami rides and sings next to one of this cars. She also did in a special DJ tour hosted by Toyota and House Nation, called X"202" presents house nation × Ami Suzuki Tour, in which she performed in several discos and nightclubs in Japan.トヨタの新型車「X“202”」が日本最大級のハウスイベントとコラボレーション！！ | エイベックス・マーケティング株式会社 | News2u.net ==Track listing== == Chart rankings == {| class="wikitable" !Charts !Peak position |- |Oricon Daily Chart |align="center"|16 |- |Oricon Weekly Chart |align="center"|28 |} === Reported sales and certifications === {| class="wikitable" !Chart !Amount |- |Oricon certified sales (subscription only) |align="center"|2,949 |} ==References== Category:2009 singles Category:Ami Suzuki songs Category:2009 songs Category:Avex Trax singles
title: Kiss Kiss Kiss (Ami Suzuki song)
